author: callyfromauron
title: Penny Lane Liverpool Philosophy Hub
description: There is a lack of philosophical discussion at community level about Cardano, so an opportunity to engage people is being missed.
solution: Work with established community philosophy networks, to build a philosophy-based Hub and lead philosophy discussion within Catalyst.
experience: Vanessa Cardui and Stephen Whitenstall are skilled community facilitators; ex-members of Liverpool PIPs; and active within Catalyst.
